mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.match_id AS "matchId", a.match_user AS "matchUser.id", a.match_right_rate AS "matchRightRate", a.match_hse AS "matchHse", a.match_answer AS "matchAnswer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.pre_stat AS "preStat", u2.name AS "matchUser.name"
LEFT JOIN bkm_match b ON b.id = a.match_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.match_user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bkm_match_info( id, match_id, match_user, match_right_rate, match_hse, match_answer, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, pre_stat ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{matchId}, #{matchUser.id}, #{matchRightRate}, #{matchHse}, #{matchAnswer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{preStat} )
